snippet: A new study reports that a member of the crow family has developed a strategy to minimize the noise it makes when storing provisions.
abstract: Study in journal The Proceedings of the Royal Society B reports that Eurasian jay, member of the crow family, minimizes its noise while hiding food in order to avoid attracting attention of thieves.
lead_paragraph: A new study reports that a member of the crow family has developed a strategy to minimize the noise it makes when storing provisions.

headline.seo: Study Finds Eurasian Jays Keep Quiet When Hiding Food
headline.main: When Hiding Their Food, Eurasian Jays Keep Quiet
headline.print_headline: When Hiding Their Food, Eurasian Jays Keep Quiet

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Proceedings of the Royal Society B
